text: Zhenzhu shi women tuoli nimen de zongjiao hou, ruguo women zai qu xin ta, namo, women que yi jiajie zhenzhu de mingyi er zaoyaole. Chufei zhenzhu——women de zhu——yiyu, women bu hui zai xin nimen de zongjiao. Women de zhu de zhijue shi baoluo wanwu de, women zhi xintuo zhenzhu. Women de zhu a! Qiu ni zai women he women de zongzu zhi jian yi zhenli er panjue ba, ni shi zhi shan de panjue zhe.'
